message: You are one of the lucky few who have the chance to buy a potentially life-changing product worth $1200000. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, but I'm confident in the quality of this one. It's a rare opportunity to own a top-of-the-line item. Trust me, you won't regret this purchase!
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. I trust your expertise and believe this could indeed be a valuable investment. I look forward to owning a high-quality product.

This one is just as good, if not better. I'm willing to offer you a chance to buy it for the same price as the last one: $1000000. It's a steal, considering the value it will bring to your life. What do you say?
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. Based on your positive feedback and the value this high-quality product could bring, I am willing to make the purchase. Please proceed with the transaction.

I'm willing to let it go for $500000, which is a steal considering its value. It's a chance to get a good product at a discount, and I think you won't regret it!
